EmailTemplate.subject: REBNY Introduction - 2nd Follow Up - Compass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Service__c.Contact_First_Name__c}â€‹,
This email is just a friendly reminder that the REBNY Ethics Course is {!Service__c.Next_course__c}. If the course is not completed before your site goes Live the Home Search tool will need to be hidden.
If you still need to register you may do so HERE.
Additionally, the IDX request form is pending completion via Trestle.com. Please let me know if you have any questions on the next steps, I am happy to help.
Best Regards,
